model.name: Wan2.1 Text2video Nexus 1.3B
model.description: The Nexus text2video finetune model is an enhanced small model. The 1.3B Nexus finetune adds a major enhancement to the wan2.1 - 1.3b text2video model. Built on CausVid 1.3b

prompt: scene: "traditional Japanese dojo, wooden floor, shoji screens, serene yet intense atmosphere", subjects: "samurai on left and medieval knight on right engaged in fierce duel, medium close-up, slightly low angle", samurai: "traditional black kimono, white sash, raised katana held with perfect hands, poised to strike, swift precise movement", knight: "medieval armour, silver helmet with red plume, holding broadsword in defensive stance, perfect hands gripping hilt", combat: "dynamic clash of blades, swift controlled movements, clear separation of weapons, realistic metallic sheen, intense duel energy", camera: "medium close-up, slightly low angle, cinematic framing", lighting: "natural light highlighting katana blade and knight armour reflections", style: "photorealistic, traditional, cinematic, nothing modern", environment: "polished wooden dojo floor, shoji screens diffusing soft light", quality: "high detail, crisp edges on weapons, clean silhouettes", neg: "blurry weapons, fused blades, melted shapes, extra limbs, modern items, text, watermark".
